title: New & Video: Moon Bounce – Telephone
content:
Moon Bounce’s ‘Darn Your Best Frock EP’ was one of our faves when it dropped last year, since then the road has been a quiet one for fans of his work. His comeback is an impressive one, just as disorientating and lush in terms of production, but now complete with vocals that give the whole thing a new level of personality.

The video is also charmingly wacky.

Stream the new track and video below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
